001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import org.hamcrest.Description;
004import org.hamcrest.Matcher;
005import org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
007
008import java.io.File;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010import java.util.Optional;
011import java.util.jar.Attributes;
012import java.util.jar.Manifest;
013
014import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Submit.ManifestAttributes.*;
015import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
016import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
017import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
018
019public class ProjectSubmissionsProcessorTest {
020
021  /**
022   * Given: A submission from a student whose name is in the grade book,
023   * but whose id is not
024   *
025   * When: The submission is recorded
026   *
027   * Then: The submission is noted under the expected id and a new Student
028   * is <b>not</b> created.
029   *
030   * This tests issue #52 (https://github.com/DavidWhitlock/PortlandStateJava/issues/52)
031   */
032  @Test
033  public void matchStudentBasedOnFirstAndLastName() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
034    String projectName = "Project";
035
036    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
037    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
038
039    String studentName = student.getFirstName() + " " + student.getLastName();
040    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
041    String wrongEmail = "Not the email that we expect";
042    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
043
044    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, studentName, wrongStudentId, wrongEmail, submissionComment);
045
046    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
047
048    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
049
050    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
051  }
052
053  @Test
054  public void matchStudentBasedOnNickAndLastName() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
055    String projectName = "Project";
056
057    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
058    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
059
060    String studentName = student.getNickName() + " " + student.getLastName();
061    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
062    String wrongEmail = "Not the email that we expect";
063    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
064
065    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, studentName, wrongStudentId, wrongEmail, submissionComment);
066
067    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
068
069    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
070
071    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  public void matchStudentBasedOnEmail() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
076    String projectName = "Project";
077
078    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
079    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
080
081    String studentName = "Not the student name we expect";
082    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
083    String email = student.getEmail();
084    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
085
086    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, studentName, wrongStudentId, email, submissionComment);
087
088    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
089
090    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
091
092    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
093  }
094
095  @Test
096  public void submissionDoesNotMatchAnyStudentInGradeBook() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
097    String projectName = "Project";
098
099    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
100    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
101
102    String studentName = "Not the student name we expect";
103    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
104    String wrongEmail = "Not the email we expect";
105    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
106
107    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, studentName, wrongStudentId, wrongEmail, submissionComment);
108
109    assertThrows(StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException.class, () ->
110      noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest)
111    );
112  }
113
114  @Test
115  public void submissionTimeNotedInGradeBook() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
116    String projectName = "Project";
117
118    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
119    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
120
121    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
122    LocalDateTime submissionDate = LocalDateTime.now().minusHours(2).withNano(0);
123    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, student, submissionDate, submissionComment);
124
125    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
126
127    assertThat(student.getGrade(projectName).getSubmissionTimes(), contains(submissionDate));
128  }
129
130  @Test
131  public void submissionsPastDueDateAreLate() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
132    String projectName = "Project";
133    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now();
134
135    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, dueDate);
136    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
137
138    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
139    LocalDateTime submissionDate = dueDate.plusDays(3);
140    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, student, submissionDate, submissionComment);
141
142    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
143
144    assertThat(student.getLate(), contains(projectName));
145  }
146
147  @Test
148  public void submissionsBeforeDueDateAreNoteLate() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
149    String projectName = "Project";
150    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now();
151
152    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, dueDate);
153    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
154
155    String submissionComment = "This is only a test";
156    LocalDateTime submissionDate = dueDate.minusDays(3);
157    Manifest manifest = createManifest(projectName, student, submissionDate, submissionComment);
158
159    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
160
161    assertThat(student.getLate(), not(contains(projectName)));
162  }
163
164  private Manifest createManifest(String projectName, Student student, LocalDateTime submissionDate, String submissionComment) {
165    return createManifest(projectName, student.getFullName(), student.getId(), student.getEmail(), submissionComment,
166      Submit.ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submissionDate));
167  }
168
169  private void noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(GradeBook gradebook, Manifest manifest) throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
170    ProjectSubmissionsProcessor processor =
171      new ProjectSubmissionsProcessor(new File(System.getProperty("user.dir")), gradebook);
172    processor.noteSubmissionInGradeBook(manifest);
173  }
174
175  private void assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(String projectName, Student student) {
176    Grade grade = student.getGrade(projectName);
177    assertThat(grade, not(nullValue()));
178    assertThat(grade.isNotGraded(), equalTo(true));
179  }
180
181  private Manifest createManifest(String projectName, String studentName, String wrongStudentId, String wrongEmail, String submissionComment) {
182    return createManifest(projectName, studentName, wrongStudentId, wrongEmail, submissionComment, Submit.ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(LocalDateTime.now()));
183  }
184
185  private Manifest createManifest(String projectName, String studentName, String wrongStudentId, String wrongEmail, String submissionComment, String submissionTime) {
186    Manifest manifest = new Manifest();
187    Attributes attributes = manifest.getMainAttributes();
188    attributes.put(USER_ID, wrongStudentId);
189    attributes.put(USER_EMAIL, wrongEmail);
190    attributes.put(USER_NAME, studentName);
191    attributes.put(PROJECT_NAME, projectName);
192    attributes.put(SUBMISSION_TIME, submissionTime);
193    attributes.put(SUBMISSION_COMMENT, submissionComment);
194    return manifest;
195  }
196
197  private Student createStudentInGradeBook(GradeBook gradebook) {
198    Student student = new Student("studentId");
199    student.setFirstName("firstName");
200    student.setLastName("lastName");
201    student.setNickName("nickName");
202    student.setEmail("test@test.com");
203    gradebook.addStudent(student);
204    return student;
205  }
206
207  private GradeBook createGradeBookWithAssignment(String projectName) {
208    return createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, null);
209  }
210
211  private GradeBook createGradeBookWithAssignment(String projectName, LocalDateTime dueDate) {
212    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
213    Assignment assignment = new Assignment(projectName, 10.0);
214    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
215    gradebook.addAssignment(assignment);
216    return gradebook;
217  }
218
219  // Test match on email and nick name
220
221  private static Matcher<? super Optional<Student>> isNotPresent() {
222    return new TypeSafeMatcher<Optional<Student>>() {
223      @Override
224      protected boolean matchesSafely(Optional<Student> item) {
225        return !item.isPresent();
226      }
227
228      @Override
229      public void describeTo(Description description) {
230        description.appendText("an Optional<Student> that is not present");
231      }
232    };
233  }
234}
